Une plate-forme qui permet aux utilisateurs l'Ã©change d'articles (physiques, virtuels ou de services) avec d'autres utilisateurs.

Types d'Ã©changes:
* Item par Item,
* Item par Service,
* Service par Service.

## ğŸGetting Started
Ces intructions vous aiderons a setup votre propre copie de <b>Treydi-Desktop</b> sur votre machine, pour le dÃ©velopement ou le test.

### ğŸ“šPrerequisite

Ce projet a besoin:
-   ![IntelliJ IDEA](https://img.shields.io/badge/IntelliJIDEA-000000.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=intellij-idea&logoColor=white) OU ![Eclipse](https://img.shields.io/badge/Eclipse-FE7A16.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=Eclipse&logoColor=white)
-   jdbc:mysql Driver (Mysql ConnectorJ)
-   Xammp // Wamp
-   treydi_db.sql


### ğŸ§°Installation

Etapes pour l'installation du projet:

1. Clone this repository
    ```bash
    git clone https://github.com/MoezBenHassen/Treydi-Desktop.git
    ```
1. CrÃ©er la BD en important le fichier `treydi_db.sql` dans <b>phpmyadmin</b>
1. Open project dans IntelliJ
1. Ajouter le driver jdbc dans &nbsp; `File > Project structure > Libraries > â•`
1. VÃ©rifier l'url dans le fichier &nbsp; `Utils>MyDB.java`
    ```java
    final String url = "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/treydi_db";
    ```
1. â–¶ Run

## ğŸ“–Contributing

### ğŸŸ£ To contribute as a team member
1. Clone the project 
    ```bash
    git clone https://github.com/MoezBenHassen/Treydi-Desktop.git
    ```
2. Create your  Branch 
    ```bash
    git checkout -b "your_branch_name"
    ```
2. Stage your files 
    ```bash
    git add .
    ```
3. Commit your first commit 
    ```bash
    git commit -m "initial commit"
    ```
4. Push to the Branch to the remote 
    ```bash
    git push origin your_branch_name
    ```
5. Start working 
5. when you finish a feature you follow the usual procedure to push work to the remote repository :  
    ```bash
    git add .
    git commit -m " describe your changes "
    git push origin your_branch_name
    ```

### ğŸ”´ To contribute as a non team member

1. Fork the Project
2. Create your Feature Branch (`git checkout -b feature/AmazingFeature`)
3. Commit your Changes (`git commit -m 'Add some AmazingFeature'`)
4. Push to the Branch (`git push origin feature/AmazingFeature`)
5. Open a Pull Request
